---
title: "Fuel Price in WA"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
Files <- dir(path = ".", pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = F, recursive = TRUE)
Fuel_Data <- do.call(rbind,lapply(Files,read.csv))
```

```{r}
ULP <- Fuel_Data %>% filter(PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION == 'ULP') %>%
  mutate(PUBLISH_DATE = as_date(PUBLISH_DATE,format = "%d/%m/%Y")) %>% 
  group_by(PUBLISH_DATE,BRAND_DESCRIPTION) %>% 
  summarise(PRICE = mean(PRODUCT_PRICE)) %>% 
  ungroup()
```
```{r}
ggplot(ULP,aes(PUBLISH_DATE,PRICE,color=BRAND_DESCRIPTION)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal()
```
